Enums/CardType.html.name: CardType
Enums/CardType.html.abstract: Enum containing most known types of credit and debit cards.

Classes/CardValidator.html.name: CardValidator
Classes/CardValidator.html.abstract: An object that provides static methods for validating and formatting card numbers, expiry dates, and cvc values, and detecting card types.

Structs/IBANSpecification.html.name: IBANSpecification
Structs/IBANSpecification.html.abstract: Contains the country-specific specifications for countries that adopt the IBAN standard.

Classes/IBANValidator.html.name: IBANValidator
Classes/IBANValidator.html.abstract: An object that provides a static method to validate IBAN values.

Classes/IBANTextField.html.name: IBANTextField
Classes/IBANTextField.html.abstract: A text field object designed for the entry of an IBAN value. This field formats and validates the IBAN in real time.

Structs/CardOneClickInfo.html#/s:5Adyen1.name: number

Classes/InputSelectItem.html#/s:5Adyen15.name: identifier

Classes/InputSelectItem.html#/s:5Adyen15.name: imageURL
Classes/InputSelectItem.html#/s:5Adyen15.abstract: Optional URL for the icon of an item.

Enums/InputType.html#/s:5Adyen9InputType.name: select
Enums/InputType.html#/s:5Adyen9InputType.abstract: Input type should be selected from the given list.

Enums/InputType.html#/s:5Adyen9InputType.name: cardToken
Enums/InputType.html#/s:5Adyen9InputType.abstract: Card token input type. By default, cvcOptional is false.

Classes/InputDetail.html#/s:5Adyen11Inpu.name: items
Classes/InputDetail.html#/s:5Adyen11Inpu.abstract: An array of InputSelectItem. Only be available if type is .select.

Classes/InputDetail.html#/s:5Adyen11Inpu.name: inputDetails
Classes/InputDetail.html#/s:5Adyen11Inpu.abstract: An array of input details nested in the receiver.

Classes/PaymentDetails.html#/s:5Adyen14P.name: setDetail(value:forKey:)

Classes/PaymentDetails.html#/s:5Adyen14P.name: setDetail(value:forKey:)
Classes/PaymentDetails.html#/s:5Adyen14P.abstract: Update the detail defined by a given key with the bool value provided.

Classes/PaymentDetails.html#/s:5Adyen14P.abstract: Fills installments selection for the card transaction.

Classes/PaymentDetails.html#/s:5Adyen14P.name: fillBillingAddress(_:)
Classes/PaymentDetails.html#/s:5Adyen14P.abstract: Fills the billing address for a transaction that requires AVS.

Classes/PaymentMethod.html#/s:5Adyen13Pa.name: logoURL
Classes/PaymentMethod.html#/s:5Adyen13Pa.abstract: A URL to the logo of the payment method.

Classes/PaymentMethod.html#/s:5Adyen13Pa.name: members
Classes/PaymentMethod.html#/s:5Adyen13Pa.abstract: Members of the payment method (only applicable when the receiver is a group).

Classes/PaymentMethod.html#/s:5Adyen13Pa.name: isOneClick
Classes/PaymentMethod.html#/s:5Adyen13Pa.abstract: A Boolean value indicating whether the payment method is a one-click payment method, which means that it can be easily completed by the user.

Classes/PaymentMethod.html#/s:5Adyen13Pa.name: oneClickInfo
Classes/PaymentMethod.html#/s:5Adyen13Pa.abstract: The information that was stored for this payment payment method, or nil if this is not a one-click payment method.

Classes/PaymentMethod.html#/s:5Adyen13Pa.name: inputDetails
Classes/PaymentMethod.html#/s:5Adyen13Pa.abstract: The input details that should be filled in to complete the payment.

Classes/PaymentMethod.html#/s:5Adyen13Pa.name: oneClick
Classes/PaymentMethod.html#/s:5Adyen13Pa.abstract: A Boolean value indicating whether the payment method is a one-click payment method, which means that it can be easily completed by the user.

Classes/PaymentMethod.html.name: PaymentMethod
Classes/PaymentMethod.html.abstract: An object representing a payment method used to complete a payment.

Classes/PaymentDetails.html.name: PaymentDetails
Classes/PaymentDetails.html.abstract: An object that holds the list of InputDetail items required for to process a transaction.

Classes/InputDetail.html.name: InputDetail
Classes/InputDetail.html.abstract: An object describing a payment detail required to process the transaction.

Classes/InputSelectItem.html.name: InputSelectItem
Classes/InputSelectItem.html.abstract: An object representing a selectable item used in InputDetail with select type.

Payment Method.html#/s:5Adyen12OneClickI.name: OneClickInfo
Payment Method.html#/s:5Adyen12OneClickI.abstract: Instances conforming to this protocol provide access to the information that was stored for a payment method.

Structs/CardOneClickInfo.html.name: CardOneClickInfo
Structs/CardOneClickInfo.html.abstract: Object that contains stored card info used to perform previous card payments.

Structs/PayPalOneClickInfo.html.name: PayPalOneClickInfo
Structs/PayPalOneClickInfo.html.abstract: Object that contains stored info used to perform previous PayPal payments.

Enums/PaymentRequestResult.html#/s:5Adye.name: payment
Enums/PaymentRequestResult.html#/s:5Adye.abstract: In case of success a Payment object will be returned.

Enums/PaymentRequestResult.html#/s:5Adye.name: error
Enums/PaymentRequestResult.html#/s:5Adye.abstract: In case of failure an Error will be returned.

Protocols/PaymentRequestDelegate.html#/s.name: paymentRequest(_:requiresPaymentDataForToken:completion:)
Protocols/PaymentRequestDelegate.html#/s.abstract: Given the PaymentRequest that started the payment flow and token, waits for data from merchant server to be passed via completion.

Protocols/PaymentRequestDelegate.html#/s.name: paymentRequest(_:requiresPaymentMethodFrom:available:completion:)
Protocols/PaymentRequestDelegate.html#/s.abstract: Given a list of PaymentMethod (available and preferred) waits for the selection via completion.

Protocols/PaymentRequestDelegate.html#/s.name: paymentRequest(_:requiresReturnURLFrom:completion:)
Protocols/PaymentRequestDelegate.html#/s.abstract: This method is called when a URL redirection needs to be executed.

Protocols/PaymentRequestDelegate.html#/s.name: paymentRequest(_:requiresPaymentDetails:completion:)
Protocols/PaymentRequestDelegate.html#/s.abstract: This method is called when input is needed for completing the transation. The filled PaymentDetails should be sent via completion.

Protocols/PaymentRequestDelegate.html#/s.name: paymentRequest(_:didFinishWith:)
Protocols/PaymentRequestDelegate.html#/s.abstract: This method is called when the payment flow is finished.

Classes/PaymentRequest.html#/s:5Adyen14P.name: init(delegate:)
Classes/PaymentRequest.html#/s:5Adyen14P.abstract: Creates a PaymentRequest object and initialises it with a provided delegate.

Classes/PaymentRequest.html#/s:5Adyen14P.name: delegate
Classes/PaymentRequest.html#/s:5Adyen14P.abstract: Delegate for controlling the payment flow. See PaymentRequestDelegate.

Classes/PaymentRequest.html#/s:5Adyen14P.name: generationTime
Classes/PaymentRequest.html#/s:5Adyen14P.abstract: Generation time. Used for generating a token for card payments.

Classes/PaymentRequest.html#/s:5Adyen14P.name: publicKey
Classes/PaymentRequest.html#/s:5Adyen14P.abstract: Public key. Used for generating a token for card payments.

Classes/PaymentRequest.html#/s:5Adyen14P.name: deletePreferred(paymentMethod:completion:)
Classes/PaymentRequest.html#/s:5Adyen14P.abstract: Permanently deletes payment method from shopper’s preferred payment options.

Protocols/PaymentRequestDelegate.html.name: PaymentRequestDelegate
Protocols/PaymentRequestDelegate.html.abstract: The payment request delegate. Used for Custom integration comunication. All delegate methods are invoked on the main thread.

Classes/Payment.html#/s:5Adyen7PaymentC6.name: method
Classes/Payment.html#/s:5Adyen7PaymentC6.abstract: The method that was used to complete the payment.

Classes/Payment.html#/s:5Adyen7PaymentC7.name: payload
Classes/Payment.html#/s:5Adyen7PaymentC7.abstract: The payload as returned from the server.

Classes/Payment.html#/s:5Adyen7PaymentC6.name: amount
Classes/Payment.html#/s:5Adyen7PaymentC6.abstract: The amount of the payment, in minor units.

Classes/Payment.html#/s:5Adyen7PaymentC1.name: currencyCode
Classes/Payment.html#/s:5Adyen7PaymentC1.abstract: The code of the currency for the payment amount.

Classes/Payment.html.name: Payment
Classes/Payment.html.abstract: An object that represents a payment that has been completed by the user. The result of the payment can be retrieved via the status property.

Structs/AppearanceConfiguration/Navigati.name: root
Structs/AppearanceConfiguration/Navigati.abstract: Only display a large title for the root view controller.

Structs/AppearanceConfiguration.html#/s:.name: navigationBarTitleTextAttributes
Structs/AppearanceConfiguration.html#/s:.abstract: The attributes used for the navigation bar’s title.

Structs/AppearanceConfiguration.html#/s:.name: navigationBarLargeTitleTextAttributes
Structs/AppearanceConfiguration.html#/s:.abstract: The attributes used for the navigation bar’s large title. Only has an effect on iOS 11 and higher.

Structs/AppearanceConfiguration/Navigati.name: NavigationBarLargeTitleDisplayMode
Structs/AppearanceConfiguration/Navigati.abstract: Display modes for the large title in a navigation bar.

Structs/AppearanceConfiguration.html#/s:.name: navigationBarLargeTitleDisplayMode
Structs/AppearanceConfiguration.html#/s:.abstract: The display mode for the large title in the navigation bar. Only has an effect on iOS 11 and higher.

Structs/AppearanceConfiguration.html#/s:.name: isNavigationBarTranslucent
Structs/AppearanceConfiguration.html#/s:.abstract: A Boolean value indicating whether the navigation bar is translucent.

Structs/AppearanceConfiguration.html#/s:.name: navigationBarCancelButtonImage
Structs/AppearanceConfiguration.html#/s:.abstract: The image of the cancel button in the navigation bar, or nil if a title should be used instead.

Structs/AppearanceConfiguration.html#/s:.name: checkoutButtonType
Structs/AppearanceConfiguration.html#/s:.abstract: The class to use for the checkout button.

Structs/AppearanceConfiguration.html#/s:.name: safariBarTintColor
Structs/AppearanceConfiguration.html#/s:.abstract: The color to tint the background of the Safari View Controller navigation bar and toolbar. Only has an effect on iOS 11 and higher.

Structs/AppearanceConfiguration.html#/s:.name: safariControlTintColor
Structs/AppearanceConfiguration.html#/s:.abstract: The color to tint the the control buttons on Safari View Controller the navigation bar and the toolbar. Only has an effect on iOS 11 and higher.

Structs/AppearanceConfiguration.html#/s:.name: tintColor
Structs/AppearanceConfiguration.html#/s:.abstract: The tint color for most buttons and actionable elements.

Structs/AppearanceConfiguration.html#/s:.name: backgroundColor
Structs/AppearanceConfiguration.html#/s:.abstract: The background color of all view controllers.

Structs/AppearanceConfiguration.html#/s:.name: default
Structs/AppearanceConfiguration.html#/s:.abstract: Returns an instance of the default appearance configuration.

Structs/AppearanceConfiguration.html#/s:.name: checkoutButtonTitleTextAttributes
Structs/AppearanceConfiguration.html#/s:.abstract: The attributes used for the checkout button’s title. Only used when checkoutButtonType is the default.

Structs/AppearanceConfiguration.html#/s:.name: checkoutButtonTitleEdgeInsets
Structs/AppearanceConfiguration.html#/s:.abstract: The insets from the edges of the checkout button to the title. Only used when checkoutButtonType the default.

Structs/AppearanceConfiguration.html#/s:.name: checkoutButtonCornerRadius
Structs/AppearanceConfiguration.html#/s:.abstract: The corner radius of the checkout button. Only used when checkoutButtonType the default.

Protocols/CheckoutViewControllerCardScan.name: shouldShowCardScanButton(for:)
Protocols/CheckoutViewControllerCardScan.abstract: Invoked when the card payment method is selected.

Protocols/CheckoutViewControllerCardScan.name: scanCard(for:completion:)
Protocols/CheckoutViewControllerCardScan.abstract: Invoked when the card scan button is tapped.

Protocols/CheckoutViewControllerDelegate.name: checkoutViewController(_:requiresPaymentDataForToken:completion:)
Protocols/CheckoutViewControllerDelegate.abstract: Invoked when the payment flow has started and payment data is requested from the merchant server.

Protocols/CheckoutViewControllerDelegate.name: checkoutViewController(_:requiresReturnURL:)
Protocols/CheckoutViewControllerDelegate.abstract: Invoked when the redirection to a URL has been made. The given completion handler should be invoked when the user returns to the application through a URL.

Protocols/CheckoutViewControllerDelegate.name: checkoutViewController(_:didFinishWith:)
Protocols/CheckoutViewControllerDelegate.abstract: Invoked when the payment flow has finished.

Classes/CheckoutViewController.html#/s:5.name: cardScanDelegate
Classes/CheckoutViewController.html#/s:5.abstract: The delegate for card scanning functionality for card payments.

Classes/CheckoutViewController.html.name: CheckoutViewController
Classes/CheckoutViewController.html.abstract: The starting point for Quick integration. Initialize and present this view controller in your app to start the payment flow. If you don’t embed the CheckoutViewController in a UINavigationController instance, a new one will be created automatically.

Protocols/CheckoutViewControllerDelegate.name: CheckoutViewControllerDelegate
Protocols/CheckoutViewControllerDelegate.abstract: The CheckoutViewControllerDelegate protocol defines the methods that a delegate of CheckoutViewController should implement to provide payment data and be informed of the payment flow progress.

Protocols/CheckoutViewControllerCardScan.name: CheckoutViewControllerCardScanDelegate
Protocols/CheckoutViewControllerCardScan.abstract: The CheckoutViewControllerCardScanDelegate protocol defines methods that the cardScanDelegate of CheckoutViewController should implement to enable card scanning functionality for card payment methods.

Structs/AppearanceConfiguration.html.name: AppearanceConfiguration
Structs/AppearanceConfiguration.html.abstract: An object used to customize the appearance of the UI components provided by this SDK.
